description: STALKER 2: Shadow of Chornobyl arrived late last year in a fairly incomplete state. Technical issues with graphics, animations, sound, and quest design were the biggest problems. But taken together, they combined to drain computer and console resources. The only option left to developers at GSC Game World was to dial back the efficacy of their vaunted A-life AI system for non-player characters. Nearly three months later, the game is still far from perfect, but the Ukrainian team has made
title: The new STALKER 2 patch is going to save you lots of time

description:
The Pokémon TCG Pocket schedule is full of events that allow you to grow your digital collection of cards.

The developers have run several events as part of the game’s Space-Time Smackdown expansion at the time of publication. T
title: Pokémon TCG Pocket schedule of events for Space-Time Smackdown

description:
The best gaming chairs provide comfort, style, and features that normal office chairs can’t match. Sure, getting one might run you a few hundred dollars more than perhaps you were expecting to pay, but the same rationale for splashing cash on a good bed works here, too. That is to say, if you’re sitting at your desk for eight hours or more per day, buying a comfortable chair that’s going to make you happy for several years is a sound idea. 

For this guide,
title: The best gaming chairs

description: Nvidia has had issues keeping up with demand for its new, premium GeForce RTX 5080 and 5090 graphics cards, but the show must go on. It has two more cards to put out this winter, the RTX 5070 Ti and the RTX 5070, and they’re launching soon. The $749 RTX 5070 Ti — the more powerful of the two upc
title: Nvidia’s cheapest RTX 50-series GPU will launch in March

description:
“Mapping the Living Lands: Dawnshore” is an early Avowed side quest that tasks you with finding a lost cartographer named Geirmund — and their missing map information. While Avowed points you in the right direction, it doesn’t tell you exactly where to find Geirmund.

In this Avowed guide, we’ll offer a full “Mapping the Living Lands: Dawnshore” walkthrough, including where to find Geirmund in Dawnshore.
title: ‘Mapping the Living Lands: Dawnshore’ quest walkthrough in Avowed

description:
Captain Henqua’s Spoils is one of the earliest treasure maps you can get in Avowed, and if you prefer a defensive playstyle, it’s an essential one to complete. Unlike some of the other maps in Dawnshore, Captain Henqua’s Spoils is comparatively straightforward and won’t even lead you into (too much) danger.

This
title: Captain Henqua’s Spoils treasure map location and solution in Avowed

description:
On Wednesday night, I enjoyed my evening by playing a few rounds of Helldivers 2 with friends. The Major Order was to defend against eleven attacks from the Illuminate, and with nine successes, I figured it was safe to let the night crew clean things up. I slept soundly with the knowledge that I had done my part in protecting humanity, but awoke to find a horrifying revelation on my Super Destroyer’s console: we failed the mission so bad that the Illuminate destroyed a whole planet, and now they’re aiming for Super Earth.

In order to underst
title: Helldivers just failed a Major Order and lost a whole dang planet

description: Nothing about Elden Ring Nightreign is normal for its developer FromSoftware. Not only is it the studio’s first spin-off, it’s the first game that isn’t a lonely adventure through a fallen kingdom. It’s a co-op experience with some battle royale elements mixed in — the kind of game you have to actually get your hands on to fully understand. It’s also going to have DLC, and thanks to the Steam page, we know how it will differ from the kind of things FromSoft normally adds to its games.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign’s Steam page has a clue about its mysterious DLC

description: Juggling a labor movement while tearing down derelict spacecraft isn’t easy, but if you think you’ve got what it takes, Hardspace: Shipbreaker is currently free for Amazon Prime members through Apr. 13. All you need to add the game to your library is a valid
title: Hardspace: Shipbreaker headlines new free games for Prime members

description:
A power point party where all the presenters are seasoned comedians and comedy writers is not a hard sell — but Dropout’s Smartypants goes above and beyond its mandate, and looks to continue doing so, based on this teaser for its sophomore season.

The show’s first go-round featured informative presentations, like the origin of the “fruits and vegetables” divide; surreal ones, like how human sexual experience would improve if it was just one big sperm; media criticism, like arguing which cartoon chara
title: Smartypants invites Cameron Esposito, Hank Green to the powerpoint party in second season

description:
Grasshopper Manufacture, the Japanese developer behind games like No More Heroes and Killer7, recently publicized its ongoing struggle with fans randomly showing up at its Tokyo studio and asked everyone to, uh, stop doing that.

“We’ve had a lot of fans showing up at the studio unannounced, which has actually started to become a bit of an issue,” a Grasshopper rep posted to X (former
title: No More Heroes dev to fans: Please stop showing up at our studio

description: Making friends in adulthood is hard, or at least, harder than it is than in your teens or twenties. With an epidemic of loneliness on the rise and the continued disappearance of so-called “third places” across the United States, how does one go about making (and maintaining) relationships in our hectic and harrowing world? For Tim Robinson’s cha
title: Is this new horror comedy starring Tim Robinson the cure for male loneliness?

description:
Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds will have a closed network test between Friday, Feb. 23, and Sunday, Feb. 25, for PlayStation 5 users.

Warp through Travel Rings into different dimensions early in Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds’ closed network test. Race against other players across land, sea, air, space, and time as some of your favorite characters from the Sonic franchise — as long as you get selected to be a tester. Unfortunately, signing up does not guarantee you a spot in the closed network test, but Sonic and racing game fans should still sign up for a chance to play!
title: How to sign up for Sonic Racing CrossWorlds closed network test

description:
Iconic vocaloid superstar Hatsune Miku’s first ever theatrical feature hits North American theaters this spring. Colorful Stage! The Movie: A Miku Who Can’t Sing originally debuted in Japan on Jan. 27.

Colorful Stage! The Movie: A Miku Who Can’t Sing is specifically based on popular gacha rhythm game Hatsune Miku: Colorful Stage. The game itself doesn’t really feature Miku beyond the music. Instead the story focuses more on the other characters, who can all enter an alter
title: Hatsune Miku gets her first ever movie

description:
The Voice is an Avowed character (insomuch as a disembodied entity can be a character) who you’ll talk to during the “Message from Afar” main story mission. One of your first interactions with the Voice is a choice.

The Voice offers you a “power” in exchange for a “favor,” and the choice you make has immediate ramifications on your character. Here’s if you should accept the Voice’s power in Avowed, an
title: Should you accept The Voice’s power in ‘Message from Afar’ in Avowed?

description: Apparently, someone at Peacock noticed that Anthony Mackie is all over billboards, TV spots, and movie screens right now, with the release of Captain America: Brave New World, in which he stars as the new Captain America. The streaming service took advantage by releasing its first teaser trailer for season 2 of Twisted Metal, the video game derived post-apocalyptic series starring Mackie as a delivery driver in a wasteland full of over-the-top characters who love to go fast and blo
title: Peacock notices Anthony Mackie in Captain America, promotes Anthony Mackie in Twisted Metal season 2

description:
In Emerald Stair, the second region in Avowed, there are a lot of fast travel locations (camps and beacons) for you to utilize.

Camps and beacons make your journey across the Living Lands a little easier as you can teleport from one edge of a zone to another in an instant. However, you’ll need to find them first, and they’re not the easiest landmarks to spot when there are twisting vines and decayed ruins blocking your line of sight.

To ease your adventure, we’ve marked the location of all fast travel locations in the Emeral
title: All Emerald Stair fast travel locations (camps and beacons) in Avowed

description:
In Dawnshore, the first region in Avowed, the fast travel locations (party camps and beacons) allow you to zip around the map so you don’t have to walk past the same riverbed 50 times.

Camps and beacons are your primary means of quickly getting around the Living Lands in Avowed. Teleporting to either a camp or beacon will streamline your exploration as walking from one edge of a zone to another can take a very long time. However, camps and beacons can be a little hard to find as they can be hidden around the environment.
title: All Dawnshore fast travel locations (camps and beacons) in Avowed

description:
Companions join you as party members in your quest to end the Dreamscourge in Avowed.

Each companion comes with their own backstory, abilities, and side quests as you travel across the Living Lands. They provide a voice of reason and act as a trusty support pillar whenever you’re faced with a hint of adversity. Not only do they guide you in your decisions, they destroy any enemy who stands in your way with their brutal strength. Also, they can give you stat bonuses.

However, they don’t join your journey from the get-go. You’ll need to
title: All companions in Avowed and when you unlock them

description:
You can play from a third-person perspective in Avowed, a notable deviation from developer Obsidian Entertainment’s previous big RPG, The Outer Worlds, in which you played the whole game from a first-person perspective.

If you’re the type who prefers to see your character model in action, here’s how to switch to third-person in Avowed.

Ho
title: How to switch to third-person view in Avowed

description: While all eyes were on State of Play yesterday, Konami uploaded an Xbox Series X/S version of the Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater release date reveal from Sony’s broadcast. The cinematic footage in this alternate video is the same apart from the ending, which teases something Bomberman-related instead of the Ape Escape content returning for the PlayStation 5 and Steam releases.
title: Metal Gear Solid Delta on Xbox replaces Ape Escape minigame with Bomberman

description:
You’ll assign attribute points in Avowed while creating a new character. The background you pick initially allots these points, but you’re free to reassign them as you desire. And yes, you’ll get more attribute points as you play.

In this Avowed guide, we’ll go over all of the attributes, and offer some suggestions on how to allocate your attribute points
title: The best attributes to pick first in Avowed

description:
Your background in Avowed is the baseline on which you’ll role-play for the duration of the game. Each background has unique dialogue choices, and also affects other parts of the early game in minor ways, including your weapon and your attribute points.

In this Avowed guide, we’ll explain what background to pick and break down exactly what each
title: What background should you pick in Avowed?

description:
On Feb. 19, Polygon is launching Switchboard, a newsletter that will deliver all the latest Nintendo Switch 2 news, reporting, and rumors directly to your inbox. Sign up here to get it weekly, and enjoy a preview of what to expect below.

Of the many upgrades coming with the Nintendo Switch 2, including
title: What are Hall-effect joysticks and why are they important for Switch 2?

description: The version of Peter Parker in Disney Plus’ alternate-timeline animated series Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man is facing a dilemma that his previous incarnations would find familiar: He’s taking on more than any one person could probably handle, and it’s tearing him apart. But YFNSM’s version of that conflict has built up to an unnerving point, and it’s unbalancing what’s otherwise an enjoyable reimagining of the standard Spider-Man story, with a familiar mix of superhero adventure and high school drama.
title: Someone needs to tell Spider-Man to stop multitasking

description: Konami’s first big swing with the Metal Gear Solid franchise in its post-Kojima era is coming Aug. 28, 2025. The remake of 2004’s Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater, titled Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater, is a top-to-bottom visual overhaul, giving the PS2 game a huge graphical update. Fans of the series know that the source material is stellar, but we’ll have to wait until later in 2025 to see how this re-release sha
title: Where to pre-order Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater

description: Captain America: Brave New World is the 35th film in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, which means that if Marvel wants to keep up the kind of callbacks and returning characters its recent movies are so fond of, the series would have to plumb its deepest trenches of continuity for unexplored territory. But even bearing that in mind, it’s still surprising that the single most important movie to revisit before Brave New World is 2008’s The Incredible Hulk — the movie that only sort of barely counts as part of the MCU. If you, like man
title: You owe yourself an Incredible Hulk rewatch before Captain America: Brave New World

description: Being a Warhammer 40,000 fan is tough. Not only are there all of the tabletop materials to read through, like army codexes and campaign books, there’s also the vast expanded universe in comics, video games, and books. Games Workshop commissions authors to write under the Black Library publishing arm, and there are hundreds of books delving into the grimdark future of the sci-fi setting. This includes the
title: A Warhammer 40K superfan curated a perfect reading guide for the most popular books

description: Last night’s PlayStation State of Play event rocked us with a slew of game announcements and trailers, but in between all of that was the monthly lineup for PS Plus subscribers. Said lineup includes Star Wars Jedi: Survivor, an exploration-forward, lightsaber-swinging romp with a self-contained story starring
title: Star Wars Jedi: Survivor headlines February PS Plus catalog

description: Team Asobi has announced that five new levels are coming to Astro Bot as weekly drops, starting on Feb. 13. (That’s today!) As with previous additions to the G
title: Five tough new levels (plus bots) coming to Astro Bot, starting… now

description: When it comes to shark movies, there are tiers, not rankings. There’s Jaws, all on its own at the very top, then a few genuinely great thrillers like The Shallows hanging around, and a bottom tier of absolute trash that should really never see the sun. But in between those last two is the vaunted, excellent category of silly shark movies that still kick ass. And it’s at exactly that depth you’ll find the ludicrously fun 47 Me
title: Watch one of the best killer shark thrillers ever before it leaves Netflix

description: If you’ve been following the Until Dawn movie adaptation, you may be aware that the movie isn’t a straightforward retelling of the original Supermassive game released in 2015. It features a new set of teenagers meeting a variety of grisly fates, and instead of covering one miserable but finite stretch of time, the movie is set during a terrifying time
title: Until Dawn director wanted to make his movie about ‘pretty much all’ horror genres

description:
Spend a few hours in Avowed, and you’ll start to feel as if the NPCs are obsessed with wood. Open any chest or lockbox, and inside you’ll find a branch or two hidden away for safekeeping. It might seem strange at first. But don’t worry — it won’t be long until you understand why it’s so important to them.

Avowed partially follows a level-based progression route: explore, fight enemies, get a quest, fight more enemies, finish the quest, and get experience points. Get enough to level up, and get points to put into your attributes (Constitution for extra health, Resolve for extra stamina, and
title: Avowed is a grim scramble for resources with some decent story on top

description:
Absurdity is dead. Long live absurdity.

Oh, hey, sorry. Been playing a lot of LOK Digital and reading the news. Both things live on my phone, so it’s easy to hop between them. Read a distressing headline? Boot up LOK and spell out LOLO. You’ll feel better. Well, no, you won’t feel better. But you will feel bewildered in a different way. Read about how the Treasury Department has been taken over by an unelected individual and his weird army of goons? Stop that! Spell out nonsense wo
title: LOK is an absurdist puzzle game for the present moment

description:
Learning the raid and dungeon rotation in Destiny 2 is great for farming loot you don’t have yet, and for increasing your Power in Destiny 2.

As of the Episode: Revenant update in October 2024, Bungie showcases which activity is featured (via an icon on the map), and there are now tw
title: What is the Destiny 2 raid and dungeon rotation this week?
